WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
S/V PAMPLEMOUSSE IN NEED OF FUEL AND REQUESTING
ASSISTANCE IN 04-46N 050-47W AT 171950Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRSC CAYENNE,
INMARSAT-C: 4227 99024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 59 459 430 4444, FAX: 59 459 425 9130,
E-MAIL: CAYENNE@MRSCFR.EU.
